member.name: MetafileType
member.summary: The MetafileType enumeration specifies types of metafiles. The method returns an element of this enumeration.

member.name: MetafileType.MetafileTypeInvalid
member.summary: Specifies a metafile format that is not recognized in GDI+.

member.name: MetafileType.MetafileTypeWmf
member.summary: Specifies a WMF file. Such a file contains only GDI records.

member.name: MetafileType.MetafileTypeWmfPlaceable
member.summary: Specifies a WMF file that has a placeable metafile header in front of it.

member.name: MetafileType.MetafileTypeEmf
member.summary: Specifies an EMF file. Such a file contains only GDI records.

member.name: MetafileType.MetafileTypeEmfPlusOnly
member.summary: Specifies an EMF+ file. Such a file contains only GDI+ records and must be displayed by using GDI+. Displaying the records using GDI may cause unpredictable results.

member.name: MetafileType.MetafileTypeEmfPlusDual
member.summary: Specifies an EMF+ Dual file. Such a file contains GDI+ records along with alternative GDI records and can be displayed by using either GDI or GDI+. Displaying the records using GDI may cause some quality degradation.
